name: The LightBulb
description:
A 3d Platformer made for Brackeys Game jam.

You are a Light Bulb in search of energy so you don't die trying to pass all the obstacles that you find.

Controls: A,D to move, SPACE to jump.

You can recharge energy in the plugs.

Credits:

  • 3D modelling and animations: TheLlynx
  • Programming: NaggerKnife
  • Sound and music: David Clumsy
  • Level design: JgamerStyle
